mapper.select: SELECT P.code pc_code, P.brand pc_brand, P.type pc_type, P.price pc_price, P.deliveryPrice pc_deliprice, P.grade pc_grade, P.stock pc_stock, C.name cpu_name, C.kind cpu_kind, C.speed cpu_speed, R.speed ram_speed, M.ramlimit mainboard_ramlimit, H.space hdd_space, H.speed hdd_speed, S.space ssd_space, S.speed ssd_speed, G.kind graphic_kind, O.name os_name FROM PC p JOIN CPU c ON P.cpu = C.code JOIN RAM r ON P.ram = R.code JOIN MAINBOARD m ON P.mainboard = M.code LEFT OUTER JOIN HDD h ON P.hdd = H.code LEFT OUTER JOIN SSD s ON P.ssd = S.code JOIN GRAPHIC g ON P.graphic = G.code JOIN OS o ON P.os = o.code WHERE P.code = #{pcCode}

SELECT P.code pc_code, P.brand pc_brand, P.type pc_type, C.brand cpu_brand, C.name cpu_name, C.speed cpu_speed, C.type cpu_type, C.kind cpu_kind, R.brand ram_brand, R.name ram_name, R.space ram_space, R.speed ram_speed, G.brand graphic_brand, G.name graphic_name, G.kind graphic_kind, H.brand hdd_brand, H.name hdd_name, H.space hdd_space, H.speed hdd_speed, S.brand ssd_brand, S.name ssd_name, S.space ssd_space, S.speed ssd_speed, M.brand mainboard_brand, M.name mainboard_name, M.ramslot mainboard_ramslot, M.ramLimit mainboard_ramlimit, o.name osName FROM PC p JOIN CPU c ON P.cpu = C.code JOIN RAM r ON P.ram = R.code JOIN MAINBOARD m ON P.mainboard = M.code LEFT OUTER JOIN HDD h ON P.hdd = H.code LEFT OUTER JOIN SSD s ON P.ssd = S.code JOIN GRAPHIC g ON P.graphic = G.code JOIN OS o ON P.os = o.code WHERE P.code = #{pcCode}
SELECT count(*) FROM PCIMAGE WHERE pcCode = #{pcCode} AND imgOrder>2
SELECT imgPath brandImg FROM PCIMAGE WHERE pcCode = #{pcCode, javaType=String} AND imgOrder=1 ORDER BY imgOrder
SELECT imgPath pcImg FROM PCIMAGE WHERE pcCode = #{pcCode, javaType=String} AND imgOrder>2 AND imgOrder<=#{index, javaType=int, jdbcType=NUMERIC} ORDER BY imgOrder
SELECT imgPath thumbnailImg FROM PCIMAGE WHERE pcCode = #{pcCode, javaType=String} AND imgOrder>#{index, javaType=int, jdbcType=NUMERIC} ORDER BY imgOrder
